languages.text: "Ну уж нет! Поднимем тост, и сам{mf||а} увидишь, как из искры вина разгорится пожар веселья!" {n}Джай умудряется говорить одновременно дружелюбно и свирепо.{/n}

"This is exactly the time! Let's raise a toast, and you'll see how sparks of wine can kindle into a blaze of merriment!" {n}Jae retorts, somehow managing to sound cordial and waspish at the same time.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ну уж нет! Поднимем тост, и сам{mf||а} увидишь, как из искры вина разгорится пожар веселья!" {n}Джай умудряется говорить одновременно дружелюбно и свирепо.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Like hell it's not! Let's raise a toast, and you'll see how sparks of wine can kindle into a blaze of merriment!" {n}Jae retorts, somehow managing to sound cordial and waspish at the same time.{/n}
"Like hell it's not! Let's raise a toast, and you'll see how sparks of wine can kindle into a blaze of merriment!" {n}Jae retorts, somehow managing to sound cordial and waspish at the same time.{/n}
"Like hell it's not! Let's raise a toast, and you'll see how sparks of wine can kindle into a blaze of merriment!" {n}Jae retorts, somehow managing to sound cordial and waspish at the same time.{/n}

"This is exactly the time! Let's raise a toast, and you'll see how sparks of wine can kindle into a blaze of merriment!" {n}Jae retorts, somehow managing to sound cordial and waspish at the same time.{/n}

languages.text: “现在正是时候！只要咱们举起酒杯，你就会亲眼看到烈酒的火花如何点燃快乐的火焰！”{n}婕伊反驳道。不知为何，她的声音听起来既热情、又尖酸。{/n}
languages.original_text: "This is exactly the time! Let's raise a toast, and you'll see how sparks of wine can kindle into a blaze of merriment!" {n}Jae retorts, somehow managing to sound cordial and waspish at the same time.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “去他妈的不是时候吧！只要咱们举起酒杯，你就会亲眼看到烈酒的火花如何点燃快乐的火焰！”{n}婕伊反驳道。不知为何，她的声音听起来既热情、又尖酸。{/n}

languages.text: 「ベストタイミングだね！乾杯しよう。ワインがキラキラって楽しげな炎をパッと燃え上がらせるよ！」{n}ジェイは、友好的な雰囲気の中に苛立ちも込めて、どうにか言葉を返す。{/n}
languages.original_text: "This is exactly the time! Let's raise a toast, and you'll see how sparks of wine can kindle into a blaze of merriment!" {n}Jae retorts, somehow managing to sound cordial and waspish at the same time.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「とんでもない！乾杯しましょう。ワインの火花がいかに陽気な炎に燃え上がるか、わかるはずよ！」{n}ジェイは、親しげでありながら、同時に苛立ちをも込めながら、どうにか言葉を返す。{/n}

languages.text: «¡Es precisamente el mejor momento! Brindemos ¡y verá como las chispas del vino pueden prender la hoguera del jolgorio!». {n}Jae consigue que su respuesta suene cordial e irritable a la vez.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This is exactly the time! Let's raise a toast, and you'll see how sparks of wine can kindle into a blaze of merriment!" {n}Jae retorts, somehow managing to sound cordial and waspish at the same time.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Y una porra! Brindemos ¡y verá como las chispas del vino pueden prender la hoguera del jolgorio!». {n}Jae consigue que su respuesta suene cordial e irritable a la vez.{/n}

languages.text: « Bien sûr que si ! Trinquons, et vous verrez : les étincelles de nos verres ne tarderont pas à se transformer en brasier de joie ! » {n}rétorque Jae sur un ton à la fois cordial et acerbe.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This is exactly the time! Let's raise a toast, and you'll see how sparks of wine can kindle into a blaze of merriment!" {n}Jae retorts, somehow managing to sound cordial and waspish at the same time.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Bien sûr que si ! Trinquons, et vous verrez : les étincelles de nos verres ne tarderont pas à se transformer en brasier de joie ! » {n}rétorque Jae sur un ton à la fois cordial et acerbe.{/n}

languages.text: "Das ist genau der richtige Zeitpunkt. Lasst uns anstoßen und Ihr werdet schon erleben, wie die Freuden des Weins für eine feuchtfröhliche Feier sorgen!", {n}entgegnet Jae und schafft es, dabei gleichzeitig freundlich und gereizt zu klingen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This is exactly the time! Let's raise a toast, and you'll see how sparks of wine can kindle into a blaze of merriment!" {n}Jae retorts, somehow managing to sound cordial and waspish at the same time.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Das ist genau der richtige Zeitpunkt. Lasst uns anstoßen und Ihr werdet schon erleben, wie die Freuden des Weins für eine feuchtfröhliche Feier sorgen!", {n}entgegnet Jae und schafft es, dabei gleichzeitig freundlich und gereizt zu klingen.{/n}

languages.text: "Tam da öyle bir andayız! Kadeh kaldıralım bak, birkaç yudum şarabın ortama nasıl neşe saçtığını sen de göreceksin!" {n}Jae hızla yanıt veriyor ve bir şekilde hem candan hem de huysuz bir tonda konuşmayı başarıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This is exactly the time! Let's raise a toast, and you'll see how sparks of wine can kindle into a blaze of merriment!" {n}Jae retorts, somehow managing to sound cordial and waspish at the same time.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Tam da öyle bir andayız! Kadeh kaldıralım bak, birkaç yudum şarabın ortama nasıl neşe saçtığını sen de göreceksin!" {n}Jae hızla yanıt veriyor ve bir şekilde hem candan hem de huysuz bir tonda konuşmayı başarıyor.{/n}
